notes: All hotels researched via Google Maps API. Prices are estimates in EUR per night (converted from CNY at approximately 1 EUR = 8 CNY). Actual prices vary by season and booking platform. Book via Ctrip, Booking.com, or Trip.com for best rates.

accommodation.name: Moxy Xi'an Downtown
accommodation.name_chinese: 西安繁华中心莫克西酒店

accommodation.name: Scholars Hotel PingJiangFu Suzhou
accommodation.name_chinese: 苏州书香府邸酒店平江府

accommodation.name: Millennium Harbourview Hotel Xiamen
